alert.note: Alert for Mille Lacs; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 2:02PM CDT until August 11 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mille Lacs County in east central Minnesota... East central Morrison County in central Minnesota... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 202 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saint Mathias, or 10 miles south of Brainerd, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vineland and Onamia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
